item.title: Spotify、第1四半期の売上高は前年同期比14%増の€3B、広告収入は同17%増の€329M、MAUは同22%増の515M、プレミアム加入者は同15%増の210M、そして€225M赤字 (Anne Steele/Wall Street Journal)
item.description:
Anne Steele / Wall Street Journal:
Spotify reports Q1 revenue up 14% YoY to €3B, ad revenue up 17% YoY to €329M, MAUs up 22% YoY to 515M, Premium Subscribers up 15% YoY to 210M, and a €225M loss  —  Audiostreaming giant posted lower-than-expected revenue gains as ad spending cooled

item.title: モナコやモロッコなど、世界中の王室に王室報道を広げている英国Mail Onlineの編集者ダニー・グルーム氏へのインタビュー（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）。
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
An interview with Danny Groom, the editor of Mail Online in the UK, on expanding royal coverage to royal families around the world, including Monaco and Morocco  —  Mail Online boss Danny Groom said the royal growth has “huge editorial and commercial possibilities”.

item.title: 有名アーティストのAI生成ボーカルを使ったオリジナル曲を全曲公開した、AI音楽に特化したDiscordコミュニティ「AI Hub」の様子（Chloe Xiang/VICE）
item.description:
Chloe Xiang / VICE:
A look at AI Hub, a Discord community focused on AI music that released an entire album featuring original songs using AI-generated vocals from famous artists  —  On Saturday, they released an entire album using an AI-generated copy of Travis Scott's voice, and labels are trying to kill it.

item.title: ストリーミングサービスとそのコンテンツに圧倒され、米国の一部の視聴者は、Pluto TV、Tubi、および広告付きの古典的なテレビ番組を表示するその他の無料サービスに目を向けている（Wall Street Journal）。
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
Overwhelmed by streaming services and their content, some US viewers are turning to Pluto TV, Tubi, and other free offerings that show classic TV shows with ads  —  Free streaming services Pluto TV, Tubi, Xumo Play and others show classic TV shows with ads, easing decisions for those overwhelmed with options

item.title: Netflixは今後4年間、韓国のTVシリーズ、映画、脚本番組のために韓国に25億ドルを投資する計画だ（Lee Haye-a/聯合ニュース）。
item.description:
Lee Haye-ah / Yonhap News Agency:
Netflix plans to invest $2.5B in South Korea for Korean TV series, movies, and scripted shows over the next four years  —  Netflix said Monday it will invest US$2.5 billion in South Korea over the next four years to produce Korean TV series, movies and scripted shows.

item.title: 4月23日、Metaの広告システムの不具合により、一部のキャンペーンで1日のコスト上限を超える支出が発生。代理店によると、Metaから「ほとんどフィードバックがない」とのこと（James Hercher/AdExchanger）。
item.description:
James Hercher / AdExchanger:
On April 23, a Meta ad system glitch caused some campaigns to overspend beyond their daily cost cap; agencies say they have had “next to no feedback” from Meta  —  Hope you had a peaceful Sunday.  —  If you're a Facebook advertiser, though, that may not have been the case.

item.title: ソースはこちらタッカー・カールソンは、2029年までのFox Newsとの契約更新の交渉の最中で、先週、更新される見込みだと周囲に話していた（Gabriel Sherman/Vanity Fair）。
item.description:
Gabriel Sherman / Vanity Fair:
Source: Tucker Carlson was in the midst of negotiating the renewal of his Fox News contract through 2029 and told people last week he expected it to be renewed  —  The prime-time star, who was recently negotiating his contract renewal through 2029, learned Monday that his top-rated 8 p.m. show was being taken off the air.

item.title: ソーシャルメディア・トラフィックへの依存がBuzzFeed Newsの終焉を招いた理由；Similarweb：2023年第1四半期にソーシャル・チャンネルがトラフィックの26％を占めたのに対し、HuffPostは13％（Digiday）
item.description:
Digiday:
How a reliance on social media traffic led to BuzzFeed News' demise; Similarweb: social channels made up 26% of its traffic in Q1 2023, vs. 13% at HuffPost  —  BuzzFeed News shut down Thursday due to an “over-investment” into the social-first news site, according to an internal memo from BuzzFeed Inc's CEO and founder Jonah Peretti.

item.title: 情報源：タッカー・カールソンの解雇決定はルパート・マードックから直接下され、カールソン元プロデューサーのアビー・グロスバーグの差別訴訟に関連している（Stephen Battaglio/Los Angeles Times）。
item.description:
Stephen Battaglio / Los Angeles Times:
Sources: the decision to fire Tucker Carlson came straight from Rupert Murdoch and is related to former Carlson producer Abby Grossberg's discrimination lawsuit  —  Tucker Carlson is leaving Fox News.  —  The network announced the departure of its top-rated and most provocative conservative prime-time host Monday with no explanation.

item.title: アクセル・シュプリンガー、2021年に更迭されたビルトEICのユリアン・ライヒェルトを刑事告訴、内部機密データをメディアと共有したと（フィナンシャル・タイムズ紙）
item.description:
Financial Times:
Axel Springer files a criminal complaint against Julian Reichelt, the Bild EIC ousted in 2021, saying he shared confidential internal data with a media outlet  —  Publisher pursues ex-Bild editor Julian Reichelt — who was sacked for alleged misconduct — over data leaks

item.title: CNN、ドン・レモンがCNNから解雇されたことを代理人から「知らされた」と発言したことを叱責、レモンは「会う機会を与えられた」が代わりにTwitterを利用した（Alex Griffing/Mediaite)
item.description:
Alex Griffing / Mediaite:
CNN rebukes Don Lemon for saying his agent “informed” him that CNN terminated him, saying Lemon “was offered an opportunity to meet” but instead took to Twitter  —  CNN's communications department issued a quick correction to fired anchor Don Lemon's brutal statement …

item.title: 情報源はタッカー・カールソンのFox News退社は「解雇」であり、彼は「完全に驚いている」、情報源：ニュースルームは「ショックを受けている」、ニュースがオンラインで流れたときに知った（Sarah Rumpf/Mediaite)
item.description:
Sarah Rumpf / Mediaite:
Source: Tucker Carlson's Fox News exit was “a firing” and he's “totally surprised”; sources: the newsroom is in “shock” and found out when the news broke online  —  Tucker Carlson's departure from Fox News was not voluntary, multiple sources told Mediaite.

item.title: Facebookがニュースから離れ、Twitterが衰退する中、メディアはホームページのトラフィックなど、2000年代前半のデジタルメディアの基礎概念に立ち戻る（Max Tani/Semafor)
item.description:
Max Tani / Semafor:
With Facebook's pivot away from news and Twitter's decay, media outlets return to digital media's foundational concepts of the early 2000s like homepage traffic  —  The News  —  What year is it?  Consider the following:  — The Drudge Report is the biggest political website in the country.

item.title: CNBCのキャスターHadley GambleがNBCUniversalのCEO Jeff Shellに対して不適切な行為の苦情を申し立てた、との情報：GambleはShellと以前から関係があった（Deadline)
item.description:
Deadline:
CNBC anchor Hadley Gamble filed the inappropriate conduct complaint against NBCUniversal CEO Jeff Shell; source: Gamble had a previous relationship with Shell  —  EXCLUSIVE: Multiple sources tell Deadline that the woman who filed the complaint against NBCUniversal CEO Jeff Shell …

item.title: CNN、2023年2月に女性や老化についてオンエアで発言して以来、批判を浴びていたドン・レモンと決別、レモンは解雇されたと語る（ニューヨーク・タイムズ）。
item.description:
New York Times:
CNN parts ways with Don Lemon, who had been under scrutiny since making on-air remarks about women and aging in February 2023; Lemon says he was terminated  —  Mr. Lemon, one of the network's most recognizable stars, had been under scrutiny since an uproar over on-air remarks he made about women and aging in February.
